name: Collect-A-Shape
description:
Try using fullscreen if you have any problems (Lines between tiles can appear on high resolutions)

Collect-A-Shape is a platformer game about collecting friendly shapes in order to reach your goal of... the moon??

You play as a god ball who rolls around (with A and D) and Jumps (with space) and talks to people (with E).

At any time you can bring up a menu with all your friends (using R) so you can drag them out and have fun!

Created By:

Dannycopo (Programmer)
